project.name: Siddhi Extension - Geo `proximity` operation
project.description: This is a Siddhi function(distance double, latitude double, longitude double, id string, timeStamp string, proximityTime string) that check for proximity. if given object (latitude, longitude) is within `distance` of other objects for `proximityTime` amount of time the function outputs a string of ids of those other objects else `false` is output.
